metadata.title: CVE-2022-40150 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
Those using Jettison to parse untrusted XML or JSON data may be vulnerableto Denial of Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on usersupplied input, an attacker may supply content that causes the parser tocrash by Out of memory. This effect may support a denial of service attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-40150` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjettison-java - 1.5.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjettison-java package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.3-1').
